content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property in a divorce case the defendants are entitled to half of an outbuilding and an audi a6 car the court also acknowledged the dissolution of the marriage and determined that the defendants are responsible for their personal debts the applicant n ž filed for divorce and requested maintenance and certain properties acquired during the marriage the defendant did not file a statement of defense the court granted the applicants request for divorce and ordered the defendant to pay the necessary fees the marriage will be dissolved and the division of property and handling of debts will be determined the defendant will be responsible for paying stamp duty and other costs

metadata.cost: 105.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 313.33 EUR  (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
